helpContactSupport.title: Help - {{REF:helpOptions.contactSupport}}
description: Have a question or feedback? Join our support server at the link below!

fields.name: Commands
value: To see the available commands, just type `/` and select the bot from the left side. You can then scroll through all available commands. Some commands may be hidden if you don't have permission to view them.

fields.name: Command Permissions
value: Want to restrict commands to certain roles, users, or channels? Set up permissions in the bot's integration page by going to **Server Settings** > **Integrations**, and then **Manage** for this bot.

translate.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Translations
translate.description: Thank you to our translators who have made it possible for {{COM:bot.name}} to be used in the following languages. If you are interested in providing a translation, please contact the staff in our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}).

cooldownHit.description: You can only run this command {{AMOUNT}} time(s) every {{INTERVAL}}. Please wait before attempting this command again.

devOnly.description: This action can only be done by developers.

adminOnly.description: This action can only be done by administrators.

description: I don't have all permissions required to run that command here! Please check the server and channel permissions to make sure I have the following permissions.

startupInProcess.description: {{COM:bot.name}} is still starting up. Try again later.

notImplemented.description: This feature has not been implemented yet!

bot.description: {{REF:links.templateEmbed}} helps give developers a starting point for new Discord bots, so that much of the initial setup can be avoided and developers can instead focus on meaningful bot features.

commandDescs.new: Create a new season. Use this command to start a new game flow.
commandDescs.status: Get status information for a season.
commandDescs.admin: Administrative commands for managing the bot.
commandDescs.config: Configuration commands for managing bot settings.

argDescs.season: The ID of the season to check status for.

permissions.MentionEveryone: Mention Everyone, Here, and All Roles

helpOptionDescs.commands: {{REF:helpOptions.commands}} -- What commands are there? How do I restrict who is allowed to use commands?

joinSeason.success:
You have successfully joined season with ID: **{{seasonId}}**!
The season will start in {{timeRemaining}}, or once {{playersNeeded}} more players join!
joinSeason.notOpen: Season with ID '{{seasonId}}' is not currently open for joining.
joinSeason.alreadyJoined: You have already joined season with ID '{{seasonId}}'.
joinSeason.playerNotFound: Your player profile could not be found. Please try again later or contact support.
joinSeason.genericError: An unknown error occurred while trying to join season '{{seasonId}}'. Error: {{errorMessage}}

fields.name: Game Details

status.genericError: An error occurred while retrieving status for season '{{seasonId}}'. Error: {{errorMessage}}

newCommand.season.create_success_channel:
{{mentionUser}} has started a new season with ID: **{{seasonId}}**
Season will remain open for joining for {{openDuration}}.
Use `/join season:{{seasonId}}` to join!
newCommand.season.error_min_max_players: Minimum players ({{minPlayers}}) cannot be greater than maximum players ({{maxPlayers}}).
newCommand.season.error_creator_not_found: Your player profile could not be found (Discord ID: {{discordUserId}}). Please try again later or contact support.
newCommand.season.error_player_create_failed: Failed to create your player profile (Discord ID: {{discordId}}). Please try again later or contact support.
newCommand.season.error_db: A database error occurred. Please try again later or contact support. (Details: {{details}})
newCommand.season.error_unknown_service: An unknown error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later or contact support. (Details: {{details}})
newCommand.season.error_generic_service: A generic error occurred in the service. Please try again later or contact support. (Details: {{details}})
newCommand.season.error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the season. Message: {{message}}

newCommand.commandDescs.new: Create a new season. Use this command to start a new game flow.

common.error.critical_command: A critical unexpected error occurred. Please contact support.

refs.newCommand.error_unknown_subcommand: That subcommand for 'new' isn't recognized. Please check the command and try again.

admin.terminate_season_error_database: A database error occurred while terminating season '{{seasonId}}'. Error code: {{errorCode}}
admin.terminate_season_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while terminating season '{{seasonId}}'. {{message}}

list_seasons_success.title: Seasons List{{#if statusFilter}} ({{statusFilter}}){{/if}}
list_seasons_success.description: Found **{{totalCount}}** season{{#unless (eq totalCount 1)}}s{{/unless}}{{#if statusFilter}} with status **{{statusFilter}}**{{/if}}

fields.name: Seasons

admin.list_seasons_error: An error occurred while retrieving seasons. Error: {{error}}

list_players_success.title: Players List{{#if seasonFilter}} (Season: {{seasonFilter}}){{/if}}{{#if bannedFilter}} (Banned Only){{/if}}
list_players_success.description: Found **{{totalCount}}** player{{#unless (eq totalCount 1)}}s{{/unless}}{{#if seasonFilter}} in season **{{seasonFilter}}**{{/if}}{{#if bannedFilter}} that are banned{{/if}}

fields.name: Players

admin.list_players_error: An error occurred while retrieving players. Error: {{error}}

config.update_success:
Configuration updated successfully for guild {{guildId}}!
**Updated fields:** {{updatedFields}}
config.database_error: Database error occurred while updating configuration. Error code: {{errorCode}}
config.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred while updating configuration: {{message}}
config.no_updates_provided: No configuration updates were provided. Please specify at least one setting to update.
